CustomField.description: This field is created as a part of SDT-26002 from Sprint 20
CustomField.label: Price Override Reason

value.fullName: Vendor changed - selected vendor could not perform the service
value.label: Vendor changed - selected vendor could not perform the service

value.fullName: Vendor changed - selected vendor was not the incumbent
value.label: Vendor changed - selected vendor was not the incumbent

value.fullName: Vendor changed - selected vendor could not provide Escalated service.
value.label: Vendor changed - selected vendor could not provide Escalated service.

value.fullName: Vendor changed - selected vendor did not accept the rates
value.label: Vendor changed - selected vendor did not accept the rates

value.fullName: Vendor changed - vendor cost exceeded client NTE
value.label: Vendor changed - vendor cost exceeded client NTE

value.fullName: Vendor changed - API returned 3P, client requires WM
value.label: Vendor changed - API returned 3P, client requires WM

value.fullName: Service requested is part of closed market
value.label: Service requested is part of closed market

value.fullName: Ancillary amount was incorrect per PFE/CMT action and value
value.label: Ancillary amount was incorrect per PFE/CMT action and value

value.fullName: Ancillary amount was incorrect per PFE/CMT comment
value.label: Ancillary amount was incorrect per PFE/CMT comment
